org.rapla.mobile.android.os

Class ConnectToServerBackgroundAsyncTask

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.os.ConnectToServerBackgroundAsyncTask

  • public class ConnectToServerBackgroundAsyncTask
extends
    This class contains the logic for connecting to the Rapla server. It can be stopped from the calling asyncTask.
    Author:
    Patrick Zorn
